allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive video-to-storyboard workflow with AI analysis

This update introduces a complete pipeline for converting YouTube videos into storyboards:

Features:
- VideoToStoryboardWizard component with multi-step workflow (preview, analysis, frame selection, assets, review)
- AI-powered video analysis service with Gemini integration for script extraction and scene breakdown
- Video frame extraction and asset management capabilities
- Enhanced YouTube service with video style filtering (animation, live-action, whiteboard, etc.)
- Advanced sorting and filtering options (views, likes, engagement)
- Video source tracking in storyboards with links back to original content
- Visual style detection and categorization for trending videos

Components:
- VideoToStoryboardWizard: Main wizard orchestrator
- VideoAnalysisPanel: Displays AI analysis results
- VideoFrameSelector: Frame selection and preview interface
- Step components: AnalysisStep, AssetsStep, FrameSelectionStep, ReviewStep, VideoPreviewStep

Services:
- videoAnalysisService: Handles video analysis via Gemini API
- videoAssetExtraction: Manages frame extraction and asset processing
- Enhanced youtubeService with style-based search and filtering

Backend:
- Supabase Edge Functions for video-analysis and video-asset-extraction
- YouTube API enhancements for style-based queries
